price: The magicians came to Pharaoh and said, “Will we have a reward if we prevail?”
arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
